data.name: Clock Overwhelmed
data.detailed_description:
ALSO RECOMMENDED FOR YOU:

https://store.steampowered.com/app/1613960/The_Death_Into_Trouble/
https://store.steampowered.com/app/1981230/Tales_Of_The_Death/
https://store.steampowered.com/app/1307880/Hanoi_Puzzles_Solid_Match/


About the Game


Clock Overwhelmed is a game that brings criticism to modern times, in which you have more and more tasks to do and you have to solve a real puzzle to try to fit all your activities.

Shoot all tasks in the blank spaces of your watch,
without overlapping any activity!

Features:

  • 30 carefully designed levels;
  • Original soundtrack composed especially to help you stay immersed in the game;
  • Addictive gameplay, perfect for those looking for casual action games;
  • Beautiful Lowpoly art style.

data.short_description: Organize tasks within your routine, but be careful not to overlap activities and get overwhelmed!

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows XP/Vista/7/8/10
  • Processor: 2 GHz Dual Core
  • Memory: 1 GB RAM
  • Storage: 300 MB available space

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Mac OS X 10.7+
  • Processor: 2 GHz Dual Core
  • Memory: 1 GB RAM
  • Storage: 300 MB available space

linux_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Processor: 2 GHz Dual Core
  • Memory: 1 GB RAM
  • Storage: 300 MB available space
  • Additional Notes: Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
